About

I'm beginner web developer seeking a challenging position in a dynamic company where I can apply my technical skills and grow as a professional.

I'm trained as a mechanical engineer and now I'm studying web development. I have learned programming basics by python language. And now I'm learning frontend development by Javascript because this way I can start doing real projects faster. But I'm also willing to practice with python backend development, because I like Python for its brevity and harmony.

At my previous job i got experience with buisnes processes building, automatization of standard tasks, working with command in CRM.
